transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Abhi sir good evening.
Executive: Good evening sir main se baat kar raha tha India mart se aapko konsi location ki buylead chahiye sir bataye taki main wo mere pass concern aaya tha to main waha ki kara du aapka.
Customer: Mera West Bengal mein tha.
Executive: Pura West Bengal ka chalega na aapka.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm sirf aisa to nahi sirf South Pargana North Pargana.
Customer: Nahi only West Bengal pura West Bengal jitna hai.
Executive: Theek hai main aapka na pura West Bengal ka ispe laga bhi karwa deta hu taki aapko sirf West Bengal ka aur bahar ka to aap hata dete ho na sir wo jo karna hai jo not relevant wala.
Customer: Hmm hmm pata hai.
Executive: To theek hai main aapka West Bengal ka laga deta hu aapko matlab kal to hamari chutti hogi parso se jo aapke portal pe aapko matlab pehle starting mein to kam kam dikhegi ek ek do do dikhegi fir dheere dheere karke aapka wo ek matlab ek se do se teen se buylead aapko West Bengal ke aana shuru ho jayega baki direct inquiry bhi to aata hoga sir West Bengal se wo nahi dekhte kya aap.
Customer: Sab kuch dekh rahe hain hum.
Executive: To wo bhi nahi aa raha calls.
Customer: Calls jab se hum liya na jab se India mart liya na ek bhi lead genuine nahi aaya ek bhi.
Executive: Ek bhi West Bengal se aaya hi nahi ek bhi nahi aaya sir.
Customer: Ek bhi lead genuine nahi aaya.
Executive: Genuine nahi hai matlab hum nahi dekh rahe aisa customer call aa raha hai hum to search nahi kiya to aisa kaise aa gaya aur humko to ye machine ka pata nahi knowledge nahi hai to jo lead aap log de rahe to ye to kharab lead de rahe hain na.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo to agar aisa bol raha hai to sir uska aap hame transaction number ya id share kare taki hum apni IT team se usko matlab validate karaye because aisa hota nahi hai sir jab tak wo client apna number dal ke aage form fill up nahi karega purchase nahi karega hamari taraf se wo cheez jayegi hi nahi kyuki bina number ke to hum le hi nahi sakte na koi dal raha hai form khol raha hai bhar raha hai tab ja ke hum karte hain otherwise hum bhi nahi dalte uske liye aap thoda check aap thoda check kariye hum galat nahi bol rahe hain hum kyu galat nahi nahi main to nahi nahi sir main to hum galat karenge na.
Executive: Tabhi to main keh raha hu aap mujhe whatsapp bhej dunga aapko jo jo lead bol rahi hai na uski lead ka aap mujhe screenshot bhej dena taki main apni team jo valid team hai unko bhejo bhai ke aisa aisa concern aa raha hai to inko validate kariye ki kya dikkat hai is buylead se na agar wo nahi lena hai nahi dalna hai to wo na dale post na kare matlab main unse bhi baat karu aur bolu na aapke aur unko proof rakhe ki ye dekho ye buylead hai inka mere ko answer chahiye tab wo mere ko de.
Customer: Theek.
Executive: Theek hai to ye main kar dunga theek hai aapka theek hai bas kal ke baad parso se aapko thoda dikhega aap mujhe screenshot bhej doge main aapko whatsapp pe hi kar dunga to.
Customer: Theek hai hi kar dijiye hum bhej denge aapko.
Executive: Theek hai sir main bhej dunga ok theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states leads are not genuine.

- Customer says leads are irrelevant.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to validate leads with IT team.

- Executive asked for screenshots of problematic leads.

- Executive will ensure only West Bengal leads are shown.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send screenshots of leads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, west bengal, genuine leads, validation
